dct_title_s: Plat book of Berrien County, Michigan
dct_description_sm: Abstract: Atlas of township property maps showing names of rural landowners.
Notes: Publication date estimated from absence of Michigan and federal highway numbers on folded county map and township maps.
Includes folded map affixed to page 1: Berrien Co. Mich.
